item.title: 【Deep Thoughts & Laughters】Unpopular Opinions/Hot Takes
item.description:
spicy
Here are a few of mine
- TikTok shouldn't be banned.
- The Rebuild of Evangelion movies suck.
- I hate Taylor Swift.
- Pineapple is legitimately one of my personal favorite pizza toppings.
- Mobile Suit Gundam SEED Destiny isn't as bad of a show as people make it out to be.
- Care Bears: Adventures in Care-a-Lot >>>>>>>>>>>>>> My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic
- Shrek 2 is overrated.
- Speaking of Shrek, Shrek the Third is a good movie and (overall) better than Shrek 2 and Shrek Forever After.
item.author: Astolfcool2001
